message.content: Most men in Colombia have mixed opinions about divorce. Some view it as a necessary solution to an unhappy or dysfunctional marriage, while others see it as a failure or a betrayal of traditional values. There is a general understanding that divorce can be emotionally and financially challenging for both parties involved, especially when children are involved. However, attitudes towards divorce have been gradually evolving, and many men now recognize the importance of individual happiness and personal growth, leading to a more accepting stance towards divorce.
